item.description:
A group for people with active dogs of all ages and sizes.

The meet up will be held from 11am - 1:00pm on Sunday, January 11th.

Please be sure to bring with you records for updated vaccinations for your furry friend. We'll need to see records for the rabies, distemper and kennel cough.

Looking forward to meeting all of you. If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to give us a call at 781-245-1237.

Agni & Kim
Best Friends Wakefield

group.name: The Wakefield Active Dogs Meetup Group

item.name: The Wakefield Active Dogs January Meetup
